title: Getting Rid of Fraction Denominators
text: Notice that we can just use the distributive property here to get rid of the denominator.

title: Getting Rid of Fraction Denominators
text: We can just multiply $$\frac{1}{4}$$ by the values inside the parantheses. We now have $$-5=2x+1$$

title: Solving the New Equation
text: Now, we must isolate the \"x\" term so that we can solve.

title: Solving the New Equation
text: We can isolate x by subtracting 1 from each side of the equation. We now have $$2x=-6$$

title: Solving the New Equation
text: Finally, we can divide both sides of the equation by 2. What is the value of x?
